name: Bubble Mania Preview Edition
description:
This is the Preview Release for Bubble Mania.

This is a game for the Commodore 64

-Push the bubbles into the sharks to keep them from attacking you.
-Push bubbles our of your way.
-Pop bubbles to make new pathways.
-Use strategy to block sharks into corners and plan your escape path.

*There are a few known glitches at this time.
